sql.if: and md_no in (select md_no from medicine where md_class like '%'||'전문'||'%')
and md_no in (select md_no from medicine where md_class like '%'||'일반'||'%')
and md_no in(select md_no from medicine where mi_code in(select mi_code from medicine_info where mi_type like '%'||#{searchType2}||'%'))
and md_no in (select md_no from medicine where md_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

mapper.select: select md_no ,mi_code ,md_name ,md_class ,md_nature ,md_standard_code ,md_effect ,md_use ,md_attention ,md_storage ,md_term ,md_drug ,md_component from medicine where md_no = #{mdNo}
select b.md_name from pre_drug a, medicine b where ps_code = #{psCode} and a.md_no = b.md_no and rownum = 1
select count(a.ps_code) from pre_drug a, prescription b where b.ps_code = #{psCode} and a.ps_code = b.ps_code

select substr(a.md_class,1,2) as md_class , b.mi_type , a.md_no , a.mi_code , a.md_term , b.mi_use , b.mi_company , a.md_name , a.md_drug , b.mi_unit , b.mi_price from medicine a, medicine_info b where a.mi_code = b.mi_code and a.md_name is not null
order by b.mi_type asc
select count(*) from medicine a, medicine_info b where a.mi_code = b.mi_code order by b.mi_type asc
